title: New: EDDI FRONT – Superhero Style
content:
Having announced the release of her debut EP via Best Fit Records, Brooklyn songstress Eddi Front has unveiled yet another gem in what is proving to be an enviable catalogue of tracks.

Possibly her most Lana Del Rey-esque moment so far, stumbling and caressing the singular word ‘black’ with a tender ferocity and classic sleaze, the French horn adds a Parisian vibe to Superhero Style. With yet another appearance on Pitchfork, as well as numerous buzzblogs and even some proper music blogs, Eddi Front is rapidly becoming a household name.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
